feature.label: org.eventb.ide
feature.description: This feature provides the Event-B integrated development environment. It runs on top of the Rodin platform that is available as a separate feature. The Event-B keyboard plug-in must be installed; it is located at: http://sourceforge.net/projects/rodin-b-sharp
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 ETH Zurich. All rights reserved.
